Name: King Midas
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with The Golden Blade of Midas.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: After this model has fought, each enemy Formation that lost 1 or more wounds because of an attack from this model has their Attacks Characteristic reduced by 1 permanently to a minimum of 1. This ability does not stack with itself.

Once per battle at the end of the movement step this model can elect to turn an Triumph zone within 3" of this model to gold. Once an Triumph zone has been turned gold the controller of King Midas is considered to control that Triumph and that Triumph cannot be razed by an enemy Formation.
